page.title: 10Prema Arts Centre (contd.)
page.content: theatre,with theatre and mime companies.Prema also does contemporary dance and dance from different places in the world. On the educational side, Prema runs workshops at the weekends using different kinds of crafts. During April,May and June they have done workshops in glass engraving, stencilling,creative writing,designing your own poster and landscape painting. Every week Prema does regular workshops for children on Saturday mornings and Wednesday afternoons.They do drawing,painting, collage,woodwork,lino cutting and other activities like that.
